app_descript:
App Name: Wattpad
App Package Name: wp.wattpad

Brief:

Wattpad opens a world of stories to readers and writers alike. Anyone with a passion for reading can dive into millions of stories across various genres, while aspiring authors can publish and share their own creations. Laden with a plethora of interactive features, Wattpad stands as a bridge between literature enthusiasts and the global storytelling community.
